layman_description: Valuable decorative items worth money at traders.
technical_description: Trade commodity with high monetary value and luxury classification.
player_impact: Sells for good prices at traders.

layman_description: An expensive ring that sparkles and is highly prized.
technical_description: Luxury item with maximum trade value and rarity rating.
player_impact: Extremely valuable for trading with merchants.

layman_description: Artwork that decorates your base and can be valuable.
technical_description: Decorative item with cultural value and trade-in price.
player_impact: Decorates walls and can be sold for currency.

layman_description: Collectible card that collectors value highly.
technical_description: Collectible commodity with nostalgia value and trade price.
player_impact: Sells for profit if you find collectors.

layman_description: A valuable timepiece that tracks time and looks elegant.
technical_description: Mechanical luxury item with intrinsic value.
player_impact: Worth good money when trading with NPCs.

layman_description: A rare old coin from history worth money to collectors.
technical_description: Collectible currency with historical value multiplier.
player_impact: Trades for high value at traders and collectors.

layman_description: A precious metal ingot valuable for trade.
technical_description: Refined metal commodity with precious-material classification.
player_impact: Sells for good money to traders.

layman_description: A precious green stone carved into decorative items.
technical_description: Gem material with intrinsic value and decoration potential.
player_impact: Valuable decorative item traders pay well for.

layman_description: An old glass bottle worth money to antique collectors.
technical_description: Antique item with age-based value multiplier.
player_impact: Antique dealers pay good prices for rare bottles.

layman_description: A string of pearls that's beautiful and expensive.
technical_description: Luxury accessory with gemstone value and ornamental classification.
player_impact: Highly valuable jewelry item for merchant trading.
